results.content: I'm not a beginner, but if I was, you give no guidance at all about software (claim non is needed) then use an editor that must be downloaded and installed to do your demoing.  Again, not a big deal for me, but its a very decent sized oversite.  Beyond that specific issue, just in general the production  and planning is poor so far.
